Web Design

Professional Web Design & Development

Every site we build is grounded in the same idea: clarity, reliability, and purpose.

Professional Sites That Convert Visitors Into Customers

Your website is often the first impression. A slow or outdated site drives people away, while a modern, lightning-fast build inspires trust and keeps visitors engaged long enough to reach out or buy.

Rock-Solid Reliability, Zero Headaches

You’ve got a business to run—your website shouldn’t be another thing to babysit. Our hand-coded builds don’t depend on WordPress plugins or fragile updates, so there’s nothing to break, no security holes to patch, and no downtime that costs you customers.

Save Time With a Site That Works 24/7

Your website should pull its weight—answering questions, capturing leads, and booking calls even when you’re off the clock. We design every page to guide visitors toward action, turning casual browsers into loyal customers.

Client testimonial

“Our new site loads instantly and brings in better leads. Rocinante Marketing hand-coded everything — the difference was immediate.”

Michael B.
Owner, FH Design Studio

⚙ The Rocinante Process

From first call to ongoing care

01 — Quick Chat

Discovery Call

We’ll hop on a short Zoom or phone call to learn about your business, goals, and what you want your website to do. No sales pitch — just a quick conversation to see if it’s a good fit.

02 — Plan & Pricing

Transparent Proposal

After our call, I outline exactly what’s included, how it works, and your monthly rate. Simple, clear, and built around your goals — no surprise fees or jargon.

03 — Design & Build

Your Site Comes to Life

Once you’re ready, I start designing and coding by hand. Everything is custom — no templates or WordPress — so it looks sharp, loads fast, and performs on every device.

04 — Review & Refine

Feedback Loop

You’ll preview the build and share feedback. Together we dial in design, copy, and layout until it feels exactly right for your brand.

05 — Go Live

Launch Day!

I handle setup, hosting, and domain connections. When we hit publish, your new site is live, fast, and optimized for Google Maps, speed, and conversions.

06 — Ongoing Care

Month-to-Month Support

No contracts or maintenance headaches. I keep your site secure, make updates as needed, and help your business keep growing every month.

Sound good? Let’s build something great.
